item.title: Life Expectancy based on World Bank Indicators
item.description: body { text-align: justify} We used the data from the World Bank Indicators Portal which is an icredibl rich resource to make an animation of the Life Expectancy as a function of Gross Domestic Product per capita. More precisely, this is the value of all final goods and services produced within a nation in a given year, converted at market exchange rates to current U.S. dollars, divided by the average population for the same year.
